channel.title: My Blog on Markus Engsner
channel.description: Recent content in My Blog on Markus Engsner

item.title: A new beginning
item.description: I bought this domain back in November last year, but I never ended up doing anything with it, due in part to me trying to make it from scratch with Django. However, I finally caved in and realized that it wouldn’t ever be finished that way. Therefore, I have decided to run it using the Hugo framework instead. The plan is to post the various projects I decide to tackle in my spare time, as well as whatever else comes to mind.
